item.title: Small Thought Qi Gong
item.description: Syllabus Qi Gong Standing Posture Warm Up – classic movements to loosen joints, fascia and marrow Jing Gong Sound Healing Zen Breathing Qi Gong Qi Manipulation I Fong Song Gong Qi Gong Qi Manipulation II Anapanasati Meditation Shen Gong Wing Chun Gong Fu Posture – Yee Gee Kim Yang Ma Wing Chun Small Thought I – Secret Energy Sounds Wing Chun Small Thought II – Meridian Opening Wing Chun Small Thought III – Basic Hands Partner Training for Hand Techniques – Wing Chun Hands at Distances Partner Training for Energy and Grounding – Wing Chun Sticky Hands (Dan Chi Sao) Overview of the Course The course is taught as a 12 week program consisting of 1 to 2 hour lessons, covering the Yin side of Wing Chun Qi Gong.
